subject: Re: [junit] Private Method...
msgSnippet: David, A good, and common question.  The first two hits on Google for junit private method are helpful. I can t let the question go, however, without a
messageBody:
David,

A good, and common question. The first two hits on Google for "junit
private method" are helpful.

I can't let the question go, however, without a simple request: If you
had to make the private method public, perhaps on another class, how
would that affect your design?

No need to answer that here--it's been discussed at great length and
with great passion on this list, most recently at:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/14490

Good luck,

David Saff

Truong, David wrote:

> Is there a way to call a private method but the Junit test program is
> not in the same package?
>
>
>
> Thanks,
>
> DT
>
>
>
>
>
>
